effect.Name: Overlay
effect.description: Overlay - (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the base color. Patterns or colors overlay the existing pixels while preserving the highlights and shadows of the base color. The base color is not replaced, but mixed with the blend color to reflect the lightness or darkness of the original color
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Overlay (Background) Shader | 1.1 (24.06.2024) */
parameter.description: (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the base color. Patterns or colors overlay the existing pixels while preserving the highlights and shadows of the base color. The base color is not replaced, but mixed with the blend color to reflect the lightness or darkness of the original color

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility
